attributes.action: Call for Economic Sanctions on Brunei for LGBTQ violations
attributes.additional_details: Let’s put it to the UK government that governments which legalise the marginalisation and murder of their own LGBTQ citizens, should be economically sanctioned until such changes have been made to include and improve the lives of all LGBTQ people in society.
attributes.background:
People who have same sex relations can now, under new laws, be stoned to death in Brunei. 

LGBTQ persons living in Brunei now live in state of fear with no freedom of expression.
